name: Vegan Tortilla Roll ups Recipe with Dairy free Cream Cheese
description: Vegan Tortilla Roll Ups Recipe. Veggies and Sun-dried tomato are mixed in Tofu Herb Cream Cheese and rolled to make Easy Tortilla pinwheels. Vegan Nutfree Recipe, can be gluten-free soy-free
recipeIngredient: 8 oz firm tofu (, lightly squeezed to remove excess flowing water, sliced, (see notes for soyfree))
1/4 cup finely chopped red bell pepper
1/4 cup finely chopped sun-dried tomato (, dry , not packed in oil)
1/2 cup baby spinach or basil or other fresh herbs
2  large tortillas (, gluten-free if needed (see notes for recipe for my gluten-free tortillas))

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze the tofu between paper towels to remove the excess water and slice. Add the cream cheese ingredients  in a small food processor and process until smooth. Transfer to a bowl. Taste and adjust flavor (salt, tang, add a pinch of sugar to balance if needed)
recipeInstructions.name: Squeeze the tofu between paper towels to remove the excess water and slice. Add the cream cheese ingredients  in a small food processor and process until smooth. Transfer to a bowl. Taste and adjust flavor (salt, tang, add a pinch of sugar to balance if needed)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the peppers, onion and sun dried tomato and mix. Chill for 15 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the peppers, onion and sun dried tomato and mix. Chill for 15 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the mixture on 2 large tortillas, spread evenly, not more than 1/4 inch thick.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread the mixture on 2 large tortillas, spread evenly, not more than 1/4 inch thick.

recipeInstructions.text: Add baby spinach or fresh herbs on top. Roll the tortillas tightly, use a little cream cheese to seal the ends. Chill for atleast 2 hours so that the cream cheese can get stiff and the rolls ups can be sliced easily. Slice with a sharp serrated knife. Serve cold.
recipeInstructions.name: Add baby spinach or fresh herbs on top. Roll the tortillas tightly, use a little cream cheese to seal the ends. Chill for atleast 2 hours so that the cream cheese can get stiff and the rolls ups can be sliced easily. Slice with a sharp serrated knife. Serve cold.

recipeInstructions.text: These pinwheels can also be served pan-fried. Lightly dust flour on both sides and pan fry until golden and serve. (This is how hubbs ate all)
recipeInstructions.name: These pinwheels can also be served pan-fried. Lightly dust flour on both sides and pan fry until golden and serve. (This is how hubbs ate all)

keywords: tortilla roll ups with dairy free cream cheese, vegan cream cheese tortilla roll ups, vegan tortilla pinwheels, veggie tortilla roll ups
